participant_1.background:
I love to make sure my pets are happy and healthy.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
i practice vegetarianism.

participant_2.background:
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
I was forced to use my badge on a friend to get information out of them.
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I am a ballet-loving mom of four daughters.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite color?
Hi! My favorite color is blue because it's so calming and serene. What's yours?
I like blue too! It's a great color for clothes, especially when making costumes.
I've never tried making costumes before! What do you like to make?
I love making costumes for music festivals and concerts. I love the energy of live music and I think costumes add to the experience.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a music festival before, but I'd love to go one day.
You should! They're so much fun and there's always something for everyone.
I'll have to keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family. We have a lot of fun together. I also love reading children's books.
That sounds great! I love spending time with my family too. What's your favorite children's book?
I have a lot of favorite children's books, but one of my favorites is The Giving Tree.
That's a great book! I love the message it sends.
